title: Incursion
description: This is an alternate cover edition for B01IKIDBO0 Trouble is brewing in Whitewater City where Kali, a crippled mage must meet with a powerful healer. Together with her escort, Stonewall - a man with nothing left but his own name, they must defeat bloodthirsty bandits. But with every strife comes a discovery of new landscapes within each otherâ€™s hearts.
author: Lauren L. Garcia
